ResourceHeader.ResourceName: DMSP F18 Special Sensors-Ions, Electrons, and Scintillation (SSIES) Thermal Plasma Analysis Package, Level 2 (L2), 1 s Data in HDF Format

RevisionEvent.Note: Metadata created and DOI minted by AK

Updated PublishedBy name to match ROR Registry. Added ResourceType and NamingAuthority. Changed http to https in top-level schemaLocation attribute. Fixed version number separator in top-level schemaLocation attribute. Matched version number in schemaLocation attribute to updated value in Version tag. ZCB

ResourceHeader.Description: The Special Sensors-Ions, Electrons, and Scintillation (SSIES) thermal plasma analysis package is a suite of instruments built by the Center for Space Sciences at the University of Texas at Dallas and flown on a number of the DMSP satellites. SSIESS includes a Retarding Potential Analyzer (RPA), Ion Drift meter (IDM), scintillation meter, and Langmuir probe.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: We gratefully acknowledge the University of Texas Dallas, Center for Space Sciences and the US Air Force for providing the DMSP thermal plasma data

PublicationInfo.Authors: Hairston, Marc, R.; Coley, William, R.; Heelis, Roderick, A.; Hanson, William, B.
